name: Bagehot Limited
membership: Our Managing Director Sir Graham Watson is a Member of the European Economic and Social Committee (since Oct 2015)
goal: To provide its clients with information, intelligence and advice about matters of EU policy and to assist them in pursuit of their interests at EU level
interests: Borders and Security, Climate Action, Competition, Culture and media, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Single market, Sport, Taxation, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Brexit preparation, border management, transport policy, regional policy, environment, financial services, sports policy, single market
